scenarios.context: A startup founder looking for a payment gateway and starting technical integration.

steps.text: I'm launching a new app and I need a gateway. What are your plan options and their prices?
The Pro plan looks interesting. If I sign an annual contract right away, are there any benefits?
Great, a 20% discount helps a lot. What are the uptime guarantees (SLA) for this specific plan?
Deal. I want to start the integration now. What are the first technical steps I should follow?
I tried making the first call but I received a '401 Unauthorized' error. What did I do wrong?
